Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary Magdalene:

Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: ]a~gia Maria ]magdalin/: nem nihiomi m~faicojen: n~tef ,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O St. Mary Magdalene, and the myrrh-bearing women, that He may forgive us our sins.
